author: nutildah
created_time: August 28, 2022, 08:59:33 AMLast edit: August 28, 2022, 09:27:10 AM by nutildah
content: S H I T C O I N    S I G    C A M P A I G NSignature Campaign for the First Parody Token on the First Parody Blockchain!       This is a signature campaign for SHITCOIN, a Dogeparty token created on the Dogecoin blockchain in August 2014. All bounties will be paid in Shitcoin, so you must download and install the Dogewallet to participate (click here for a step-by-step guide).The purpose of this signature campaign is to spread knowledge of Shitcoin, Dogeparty, and Dogermint tokens in specific. It also serves to raise awareness of the Historical NFT movement that started last year.This campaign will go for at least 4 weeks. If it encounters any success, it will be extended on a weekly basis; tokens distributed at the end of each week.Week 1: Aug 28 - Sept 4Week 2: Sept 5 - 11Week 3: Sept 12 - 18Week 4: Sept 19 - 25We will also award weekly prizes in the form of DOGE or Dogeparty tokens (NFTs) to top posters of our choosing.We expect the utmost professionality from all of our participants, meaning we want to be represented by competent posters and high-quality accounts. We reserve the right to remove campaign members who do not meet our expectations at our discretion and you may or may not be compensated for your work if you are removed. You must not have negative trust to participate, and please do not enroll multiple accounts into this campaign. Thank you.SIGNATURE CAMPAIGNYou must be of Member rank or above and make at least 10 posts per week. Only posts in sections that display signatures will be counted (not including posts in Off-Topic, spam megathreads, or bounty/signature campaign threads). Please don't post all your posts in one section (aka Gambling or Local sections). We prefer if you post in the Alternate cryptocurrencies boards. Posts must be at least 200 characters in length (~40 words or 3-5 sentences).Member: 1,000 tokens/weekCode:[center][i][url=https://www.dogermint.com/shitcoin/]▆▆▆ ▅▅▅ ▃▃▃ ▂▂▂ S H I T C O I N  ▂▂▂ ▃▃▃
